attributes.action: STOP increase in council tax for having home improvements nice view and general pride in your home
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
New council tax increase "peace & quite" if you have a nice view , made improvements to your home, windows, sheds, patios, central heating anything that you do to improve your home..you will be taxed on ..this will create a divide and harder for people wanting to move out to rural areas ..or just improve what they have! it is a struggle as it is now 
I thought this was a joke when i first heard it ..like "they will tax the air we breath soon"

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
